quiz.question: Where is it illegal to wear slippers in public buildings in certain local codes (an example of dress regulations)?
Which country passed laws restricting the length of lawn hedges and fences between neighbors historically?
Which island nation restricts the number of domestic cats per household in some local ordinances to protect native wildlife?
In which U.S. state was it historically illegal to wrestle a bear (still enforced in some areas)?
Which country enacted regulations that make it illegal to sell fireworks to underage buyers without ID in many areas?
Which Asian country banned live animal sales at wet markets in certain districts to prevent zoonotic risk after outbreaks?
Which country has laws that criminalize insulting the monarchy or head of state in some form?
Which country forbids import of certain chewing gum types to protect public cleanliness historically?
Which European country's penal code criminalizes leaving a child unattended in a car under extreme temperature laws?
Which country restricts the sale of certain fireworks and sparklers by age in national law?
Which country bans using washing machines outside specified hours in some apartment rules for noise control?
Which Asian city implemented a law banning famers from burning crop residues near urban limits to reduce air pollution?
Which country enforces fines for not picking up after your dog in many cities?
Which country banned the sale of certain high-caffeine energy drinks to minors in some national regulations?
Which African country forbids the wearing of camouflage-patterned clothing by civilians due to military impersonation laws?
